SpecialEffects

This class extends the animation class to allow special effects to be applied to the linear animations.  The special effects can be other animations or external events like controling the placement and features of the player’s browsers.

Summary
SpecialEffects
This class extends the animation class to allow special effects to be applied to the linear animations.
Functions
SpecialEffect
Initializes the Object
window_quake
Shake the browser window highly annoying
take_damage
Display a red translucent skrim over the browser viewport just for an instant and then fade it out.
displayPortal
Display a flashing portal effect.
create_skrim
Create a skrim layer overtop of the existing interface.

Parameters

displayPortal

SpecialEffect.prototype.displayPortal = function(options)

Display a flashing portal effect.

Parameters

optionshash containing at least a callback method to fire when the portal animation is done.

create_skrim

SpecialEffect.prototype.create_skrim = function(color)

Create a skrim layer overtop of the existing interface.

Parameters

colorcolor to set the scrim to.
